heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy, with snow showers through northern NY, Quebec, and the northern mountains, a few in the valleys, tapering off before sunrise. Partly cloudy in southeast VT into southern NH. Lows in the 20s. Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, diminishing to light after midnight.

heading: Tuesday
text: Partly sunny in southern valleys. Mostly cloudy through the north and mountains, with some afternoon clearing. Milder. Highs in the 30s, a few warmer valleys south near 40. Light winds, becoming south to southwest from the Green Mountains west near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph through the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Cloudy, with a good chance of snow showers or some valley rain showers from the Adirondacks and Rt. 2 north, hit-or-miss south. Lows in the upper 20s to low 30s north, low to mid 30s south. Winds from the south 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.
